title: Be Happier, Healthier, and More Productive; 365 Inspiring Ideas
description: Be Happier, Healthier, and More Productive; 354 Inspiring Ideas is a collection from the blog ThisIsLeslyn.com. Each suggestion is directly geared to increasing happiness, health, and productivity. As a collection, they cover the gamut of trivial but effective, to obvious and necessary. Participation in a majority of the suggestions is apt to foster - at the ver least - a sense of satisfaction and a healthier lifestyle. Both, characteristics instrumental to the sensation of happiness. Many of the suggestions generate 'fell good' hormones or intrinsic joy, producing a happier state of mind. It is an easy read, a reference, and it begs to be shared.
author: Leslyn Kantner
